document.full_text: the u.s. federal reserve said it drained $0.3 billion temporary reserves from the banking system via a 3-day reverse repurchase agreement, according to the new york fed web site.
document.title: fed drains reserves via $ billion 3-day reverse repo
lines_and_colors: the u.s. federal reserve said it drained $0.3 billion temporary reserves from the banking system via a 3-day reverse repurchase agreement, according to the new york fed web site.
